title: FizzBuzzTest
description: Build and Run Configuration for a FizzBuzz Test

location.description: Where the source is located relative to the current directory.

buildCommand.description: Command line command to execute to Build the FizzBuzz Test.

buildCommandParameters.description: Parameters to pass for building the FizzBuzz Test.

executeCommand.description: Command line command to execute to Execute the FizzBuzz Test.

executeCommandParameters.description: Parameters to pass for executing the FizzBuzz Test.

preExecute.description: Command line command to execute to before Building the FizzBuzz Test.
